text: Liar Wanted () is a 1961 Greek comedy movie directed by Giannis Dalianidis and starring Dinos Iliopoulos, Pantelis Zervos, Anna Kyriakou, Martha Karagianni, Thanasis Veggos, Periklis Christoforidis. ==Other websites== * Category:1961 comedy movies Category:Greek movies Category:Movies directed by Giannis Dalianidis
title: Liar Wanted
